creator: aravind@tgix.com
text:
1. .tar.gz file was corrupted (download ok, but the resulting tar did not have 
the lib, doc directories and the files under $ANT_HOME)
2. .zip file produces jakarta-ant-1.3 with no execute permission, so can't cd to 
it without running chmod. Same for all the subdirectories and scripts in bin

creator: bodewig@apache.org
text:
For (1) see http://jakarta.apache.org/ant/faq.html#no-gnu-tar.

For (2), this is a duplicate of Bug 1313 - fixed starting with nightly build
2001-04-25.
